eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills

Interface WauzPlayerSkill

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SkillDeath, SkillJudgement, SkillJustice, SkillPlaceholder, SkillStrength, SkillTemperance, SkillTheChariot, SkillTheDevil, SkillTheEmperor, SkillTheEmpress, SkillTheFool, SkillTheHangedMan, SkillTheHermit, SkillTheHierophant, SkillTheHighPriestess, SkillTheLovers, SkillTheMagician, SkillTheMoon, SkillTheStar, SkillTheSun, SkillTheTower, SkillTheWorld, SkillWheelOfFortune

    public interface WauzPlayerSkill
    A skill, that can be executed by a player.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzPlayerSkillExecutor

        Returns:
        The effect of the skill shown in quick slots.

      • getSkillStats

        default java.lang.String getSkillStats()
        Returns:
        The condition stats (mana, cooldown etc.) of the skill.

      • getCooldownSeconds

        Returns:

      • getManaCost

        int getManaCost()
        Returns:
        The mana cost of the skill.

      • isPhysical

        boolean isPhysical()
        Returns:
        If rage should be used for this skill instead of mana.

      • executeSkill

        boolean executeSkill(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
        Executes the skill for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who executes the skill.
        weapon - The weapon that player uses for it.
        Returns:
        If the skill hit something.
